summary: The code is a Bash script that continuously tries to install the 'canvas' package globally using 'yarn'. It runs an infinite loop and breaks out when the installation is successful.

details.comment: The code is a Bash script that continuously tries to install the 'canvas' package globally using 'yarn'. It runs an infinite loop and breaks out when the installation is successful.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
while true
do
	sudo yarn global add canvas 
	if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
                break
	fi
done
